languages.text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} during which they can only use a single ability, mimicking the effect of the Warrior's {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, which costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Целью этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} может стать только союзник, у которого есть хотя бы одно рукопашное оружие хотя бы в одном из комплектов. Этот союзник немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, во время которого может применять только способность, имитирующую {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывок{/g} воина. Она не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This ability can only target allies that have at least one melee weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immidiately gains an additional turn during which they gain the Charge ability and can only use this ability. Charge (0 AP): Allows the target ally to dash straight by 6 cells. If they collide with a creature during that movement, they attack that creature (even if it is an ally) with their melee weapon.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} during which they can only use a single ability, mimicking the effect of the Warrior's {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, which costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} during which they can only use a single ability, mimicking the effect of the Warrior's {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, which costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} during which they gain the ability to use Charge and only this ability. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): the character moves up to 6 cells in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in their path. There must be at least 2 free cells between the character and the target to use Charge.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The ally immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} during which they can only use the ability, which costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and mimicks the effect of the Warrior's {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}.

languages.text: Целью этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} может стать только союзник, у которого есть хотя бы одно рукопашное оружие хотя бы в одном из комплектов. Этот союзник немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, во время которого может применять только способность, имитирующую {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывок{/g} воина. Она не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

The ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} during which they can only use the ability, mimicking the effect of the Warrior's {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, which costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Целью этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} может стать только союзник, у которого есть хотя бы одно рукопашное оружие хотя бы в одном из комплектов. Этот союзник немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, во время которого может применять только способность, имитирующую {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывок{/g} воина. Она не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

Целью этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} может стать только союзник, у которого есть хотя бы одно рукопашное оружие хотя бы в одном из комплектов. Этот союзник немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, во время которого может применять только способность, имитирующую {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывок{/g} воина. Она не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

languages.text: 此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能释放在至少持有一件{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器的盟友身上。该盟友立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。额外回合期间，该盟友只能使用单个特定能力，此能力类似于战士的{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}英勇冲锋{/g}能力，且不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} during which they can only use a single ability, mimicking the effect of the Warrior's {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, which costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能释放在至少持有一件{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器的盟友身上。该盟友立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。额外回合期间，该盟友只能使用单个特定能力，此能力类似于战士的{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}英勇冲锋{/g}能力，且不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Solo puede seleccionarse como objetivo de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} a un aliado que tenga al menos un arma de combate {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} en uno de sus conjuntos de armas. El objetivo gana inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} durante el cual adquiere la capacidad de usar una sola capacidad que imita los efectos de la {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g} del guerrero con un coste de 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} during which they can only use a single ability, mimicking the effect of the Warrior's {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, which costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Solo puede seleccionarse como objetivo de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} a un aliado que tenga al menos un arma de combate {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} en uno de sus conjuntos de armas. El objetivo gana inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} durante el cual adquiere la capacidad de usar una sola capacidad que imita los efectos de la {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g} del guerrero con un coste de 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

Solo puede seleccionarse como objetivo de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} a un aliado que tenga al menos un arma de combate {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} en uno de sus conjuntos de armas. El objetivo gana inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra durante el cual adquiere la capacidad de usar Carga (y únicamente esta capacidad). Carga (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}): el personaje se mueve un máximo de 6 casillas en línea recta y lanza un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo contra cualquier objetivo que haya en su camino. Es necesario un mínimo de 2 casillas libres entre el personaje y el objetivo para usar Carga.

languages.text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur auf Verbündete gerichtet werden, die mindestens eine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g} in einem ihrer Waffensets haben. Der Verbündete erhält sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}, während dem er nur eine Fähigkeit einsetzen kann, die den {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g}-Effekt des Kriegers nachahmt und 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} during which they can only use a single ability, mimicking the effect of the Warrior's {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, which costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur auf Verbündete gerichtet werden, die mindestens eine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g} in einem ihrer Waffensets haben. Der Verbündete erhält sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}, während dem er nur eine Fähigkeit einsetzen kann, die den {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g}-Effekt des Kriegers nachahmt und 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet.

Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur auf Verbündete angewendet werden, die mindestens eine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Waffe in einem ihrer Waffensets haben. Das Ziel erhält sofort einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, in dem es ausschließlich die Fähigkeit Ansturm einsetzen kann. Ansturm (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): Der Charakter bewegt sich bis zu 6 Felder in einer geraden Linie und greift jedes Ziel auf seinem Weg mit einem Nahkampfangriff an. Um Ansturm einzusetzen, müssen sich mindestens 2 freie Felder zwischen dem Charakter und dem Ziel befinden.

languages.text: Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés qui disposent d'au moins une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} dans l'un de leurs ensembles d'armes. L'allié gagne immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} durant lequel il peut utiliser gratuitement une capacité reproduisant l'effet de la {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} du guerrier.{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}{/g}
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} during which they can only use a single ability, mimicking the effect of the Warrior's {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, which costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés qui disposent d'au moins une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} dans l'un de leurs ensembles d'armes. L'allié gagne immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} durant lequel il peut utiliser gratuitement une capacité reproduisant l'effet de la {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} du guerrier.

Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés qui disposent d'au moins une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} dans l'un de leurs ensembles d'armes. La cible bénéficie immédiatement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire pendant lequel elle peut utiliser Charge et uniquement cette capacité. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}) : le personnage se déplace d'un maximum de 6 cases en ligne droite et lance une attaque de mêlée contre toute cible située sur sa trajectoire. Il doit y avoir au moins 2 cases libres entre le personnage et sa cible pour utiliser Charge.

languages.text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は武器セットに{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器が1個以上入っている味方のみターゲットにできる。味方は即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加のターン{/g}を得る。このターン中は、{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}突撃{/g}（0{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}）およびこのアビリティだけを使用できる。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} during which they can only use a single ability, mimicking the effect of the Warrior's {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, which costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は武器セットに{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器が1個以上入っている味方のみターゲットにできる。ターゲットは即座に追加の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を得る。このターン中は、突撃およびこのアビリティだけを使用できる。 突撃（0{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}）：直線に最大6セル移動し、進路上のすべてのターゲットに対して近接攻撃を繰り出す。突撃を使用するには、ターゲットとキャラクターの間に何もないセルが2つ以上必要。

languages.text: Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, yalnızca silah setlerinden birinde en az bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahı olan dost birimleri hedef alabilir. Dost birim, anında bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır. Bu ek turda yalnızca tek bir kabiliyet kullanabilir ve o da Savaşçı'nın {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g} kabiliyetinin etkisini taklit ederek 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} during which they can only use a single ability, mimicking the effect of the Warrior's {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, which costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, yalnızca silah setlerinden birinde en az bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahı olan dost birimleri hedef alabilir. Hedef, anında bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} elde eder ve bu turda yalnızca Hücum ile bu kabiliyeti kullanabilir. {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g} (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}): Karakter, düz bir çizgide en fazla 6 hücre öteye doğru ilerler ve yoluna çıkan her türlü hedefe karşı bir yakın dövüş saldırısı gerçekleştirir. Hücum edebilmek için karakterle hedef arasında en az 2 boş hücre olmalıdır.

Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, yalnızca silah setlerinden birinde en az bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahı olan dost birimleri hedef alabilir. Dost birim, anında bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır. Bu ek turda yalnızca tek bir kabiliyet kullanabilir ve o da Savaşçı'nın {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g} kabiliyetinin etkisini taklit ederek 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar.
